name: Dodge the Creeps (JigmeDatse)
description:
This game was created for the Tutorial Jam game jam, and it didn't (at the point of initial submission) get to quite the place that I'd hoped.

Game testing has shown that some people may need some instruction:

  • Click on the "Start" to start
  • Use Arrow keys to move

I've tried to give those instructions verbally, and somehow failed to successfully do it.  It could be the audience.
